snippet: Kevin Marino, a lawyer for Bill Stepien, a former top aide to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, took strong issue with an internal report that put his client at the center of the George Washington Bridge lane closing scandal.
abstract: Kevin Marino, lawyer for Bill Stepien, former top aide to Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey, takes issue with internal report that puts his client at center of George Washington Bridge lane closing scandal; demands that lawyers hired to write report correct assertions that Stepien had lied to Christie, noting that at least three interviews contradict that claim.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Marino, a lawyer for Bill Stepien, a former top aide to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, took strong issue with an internal report that put his client at the center of the George Washington Bridge lane closing scandal.

headline.main: Lawyer for Ex-Christie Aide Seeks Corrections to Lane Closing Report
headline.print_headline: Lawyer for Ex-Christie Aide Seeks Corrections to Lane Closing Report

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
